alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Panola; Tate; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 06 at 5:59PM CDT until September 06 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern DeSoto County in northwestern Mississippi... East central Tunica County in northwestern Mississippi... Tate County in northwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Panola County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 559 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Arkabutla, or 8 miles northwest of Senatobia, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Senatobia, Coldwater, Como, Tunica, Phillipp, Strayhorn, Independence, North Tunica, Arkabutla, Little Texas, Barr, Buxton, Savage, Frees Corners, Crossroad, Prichard, Sarah, Poagville, Cypress Corner and Bluff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
